translation.en: ♪ How, what, where, why? ♪
translation.zh: ‎这是什么？

translation.en: ♪ What, where, why? How, what, where, why? ♪
translation.zh: ‎为什么？那是什么？

translation.en: ♪ What, where, why? Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.zh: ‎为什么？ ‎科学家 小阿达

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What the answer is ♪
translation.zh: ‎所有问题都要一一解答

translation.en: ♪ Under here, over there ♪
translation.zh: ‎向下看 向前看

translation.en: ♪ Science is everywhere you look ♪
translation.zh: ‎有趣科学无处不在

translation.en: ♪ With Iggy Peck, architect ♪
translation.zh: ‎伊吉·佩克 建筑师

translation.en: ♪ And Rosie Revere, engineer ♪
translation.zh: ‎罗西·瑞维 工程师

translation.en: ♪ So much to do ♪
translation.zh: ‎欢迎加入

translation.en: ♪ And you can help too! ♪
translation.zh: ‎一起做任务！

translation.en: ♪ A mystery, a riddle A puzzle, or a quest ♪
translation.zh: ‎神秘的谜语和拼图 还有探险

translation.en: ♪ There are wonders to discover And hypotheses to test ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起来验证科学的猜想
‎揭示奇特奥妙

translation.en: ♪ Science is the best! Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.zh: ‎好玩的科学！ ‎科学家 小阿达

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What thе answer is ♪
translation.zh: ‎所有问题都要一一解答

translation.en: ♪ Everywherе science is She's forming a hypothesis ♪
translation.zh: ‎不管有多复杂 ‎都打破砂锅问到底

translation.en: ♪ Connecting polka dots 'Cause this is scientist, Ada Twist! ♪
translation.zh:
‎解决所有谜题
‎这就是科学家 小阿达！ ‎（阿达想当科学家）

translation.en: Ladybug's got eyes on the new neighbors' house.
translation.zh: ‎瓢虫注意到了新邻居的房子

translation.en: A turntable? So, they like music.
translation.zh:
‎-一台唱片机？
‎-看来他们喜欢音乐

translation.en: Dragon, Whale Shark, any intel? Over.
translation.zh: ‎巨龙 鲸鲨 有情报吗？完毕

translation.en: [squeals] I think your new neighbors are unicorns!
translation.zh: ‎我认为你的新邻居是独角兽！

translation.en: -Over. -[Iggy] Huh?
translation.zh: ‎完毕

translation.en: Ah! Their evil bot dog's trying to take over the world! Over.
translation.zh: ‎他们的邪恶机器狗准备统治世界！ ‎完毕

translation.en: -Whoa! -Ah!
translation.zh: ‎哇啊！

translation.en: Gotcha! Iggy, what's up? You're scooting like you've seen a ghost.
translation.zh:
‎抓住你了！伊吉 怎么了？
‎你像见了鬼似的猛冲

translation.en: Not at ghost, a p-p-p-puppy!
translation.zh: ‎不是鬼 是只小狗！

translation.en: A puppy? Kids…
translation.zh: ‎小狗？孩子们…

translation.en: C'mon, crew. Let's go say hi to the new neighbors.
translation.zh:
‎来吧 伙计们
‎我们去跟新邻居打个招呼

translation.en: We're bringing my famous peppermint cookies
translation.zh: ‎我们带了我最拿手的辣薄荷饼干

translation.en: to welcome them to the neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎来欢迎他们的到来

translation.en: -That's okay, I'll stay here. -What about our investigation?
translation.zh:
‎-没关系 我就待在这里吧
‎-我们的调查怎么办？

translation.en: Don't you wanna know if they are evil unicorn bots who love music?
translation.zh:
‎你难道不想知道他们是不是
‎热爱音乐的邪恶独角兽机器人吗？

translation.en: Fine, I'll come. For science.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我一起来 为了科学

translation.en: -[barking] -[Iggy] Oh, no!
translation.zh: ‎哦 不要！

translation.en: -[Rosie] Watch out! -[Arthur yells]
translation.zh:
‎-亚瑟！
‎-小心！

translation.en: -Come on, boo. -I gotcha, buddy.
translation.zh:
‎-来吧 宝贝
‎-我抓住你了

translation.en: Sorry I doubted you, Iggy. That puppy is fierce!
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我之前还怀疑你 伊吉
‎这只小狗好凶啊！

translation.en: -It's okay. -[boy] Calypso!
translation.zh:
‎-没关系
‎-卡里普索！

translation.en: -Heel mode, activate. -[watch beeps]
translation.zh: ‎坐下模式 启动

translation.en: Sorry about that. He's usually friendly. -[all gasp] -Huh?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 他平时很友好的

translation.en: -There must be a glitch in his code. -[man] Don't worry, he doesn't bite.
translation.zh:
‎-他的代码一定有问题
‎-别担心 他不咬人

translation.en: -Unless my son programmed him to. -[kids giggle]
translation.zh: ‎除非我儿子给他编程要他这么做

translation.en: How you doing? I'm Beck.
translation.zh: ‎你们好吗？我是贝克

translation.en: -This is Benny and Bee-Bee. -Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-这是班尼和笔笔
‎-你们好

translation.en: We're the Twists. Aisha, Amari, Ada and Arthur.
translation.zh:
‎我们是崔思一家
‎艾伊莎 阿玛瑞 阿达和亚瑟

translation.en: And this is Iggy and Rosie.
translation.zh: ‎这是伊吉和罗西

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, how you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨
‎-嗨 你们好吗？

translation.en: Miss Sugarpie loves cookies!
translation.zh: ‎糖糖派小姐喜欢饼干！

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, good thing we have some right here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 幸好我们这里还有一些

translation.en: -Welcome to the neighborhood. -Thank you!
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到这个社区 ‎谢谢！

translation.en: Bee-Bee, do we shake down our guests for cookies?
translation.zh:
‎笔笔 我们要搜查客人们
‎有没有窝藏饼干吗？

translation.en: No, Glammy.
translation.zh: ‎不用啦 美美

translation.en: You can't knock the hustle, though, right?
translation.zh: ‎但是人不可貌相啊 对吗？

translation.en: -[laughing] -You know that's right.
translation.zh: ‎你说的很对

translation.en: I'm Grandma, or as I prefer, Glam-Ma.
translation.zh: ‎我是祖母 我更喜欢你们叫我奶奶

translation.en: Come, sit, tell me everything about this lovely town.
translation.zh: ‎来 请坐 告诉我这座可爱小镇的一切

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -[yelps] Oh, man! Really?!
translation.zh: ‎哦 天啊！不要啊？

translation.en: -Gotta fix that code! -[calypso barking]
translation.zh: ‎一定要修复代码！

translation.en: Wait for me! -Whoa! [sighs] -[barking]
translation.zh: ‎等等我！

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, I fixed the code.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我已经修复了代码

translation.en: Calypso, sit. Stay… Good bot.
translation.zh: ‎卡里普索 坐下 ‎别动…好孩子

translation.en: -He's cute, right? -[giggles]
translation.zh: ‎他很可爱 对吧？

translation.en: -Benny made him. -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-他是班尼造的
‎-没错 是用的回收材料

translation.en: -From recycled materials. -Fab!
translation.zh:
‎-他是班尼造的
‎-没错 是用的回收材料 ‎-厉害！
‎-真棒！

translation.en: -Wow! -Love that!
translation.zh: ‎好喜欢！

translation.en: It's cool, right?
translation.zh: ‎很酷 对吧？

translation.en: I was born without a hand, but I get to have this awesome one!
translation.zh:
‎我天生就少了一只手
‎但我得到了这只超棒的手！

translation.en: Miss Sugarpie picked the color.
translation.zh: ‎糖糖派小姐选的颜色

translation.en: -Awesome! -Amazing!
translation.zh:
‎-不错！
‎-好棒！

translation.en: Ooh!
translation.zh: ‎太厉害啦！

translation.en: Nice turntable. My dad has one.
translation.zh: ‎唱片机不错 我爸爸也有一个

translation.en: -Is this a control panel? -Ooh! For a spaceship?
translation.zh: ‎这是控制面板吗？ ‎宇宙飞船用的？

translation.en: -That's Benny's DJ controller. -DJ?
translation.zh:
‎-那是班尼的DJ控制器
‎-DJ？

translation.en: Dance party! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-那是班尼的DJ控制器
‎-DJ？ ‎舞会！来吧！

translation.en: Thanks. Maybe… uh… another time?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 不如…下次吧？

translation.en: [giggles] Comet Quest? Best TV show on the planet!
translation.zh:
‎《彗星任务》？
‎这个星球上最棒的电视节目！

translation.en: Doctor Galactic is a boss!
translation.zh: ‎银河博士是老大！

translation.en: "We don't rest until we quest!"
translation.zh: ‎“我们不达目的誓不罢休！”

translation.en: [gasps] I have an idea. You should watch it with us this weekend, Benny.
translation.zh:
‎我有一个主意
‎这周末你应该跟我们一起看 班尼

translation.en: -Um… I don't know. -[Arthur] Who's this?
translation.zh: ‎我没想好 ‎这是谁？

translation.en: Anyone ever tell you guys? You're really nosy.
translation.zh:
‎有人告诉过你们吗？
‎你们真的很爱管闲事

translation.en: -More like curious. -Totally.
translation.zh:
‎-更像是好奇
‎-没错

translation.en: That's my cousin, Dre. Watching Comet Quest is our thing.
translation.zh:
‎这是我的表哥德瑞
‎看《彗星任务》是我们的老传统了

translation.en: 'Til we moved here.
translation.zh: ‎直到我们搬到了这里

translation.en: I have an observation. I think you're homesick.
translation.zh: ‎我有个想法 我觉得你想家了

translation.en: I do miss home a lot.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想家

translation.en: But we're not going back.
translation.zh: ‎但我们不会回去了

translation.en: Maybe we can help. We're scientists.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们能帮上忙 我们是科学家

translation.en: -Yeah. -We figure stuff out.
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-我们会想出办法的

translation.en: Kids. Your dads are having a debate about which instrument is the funkiest.
translation.zh:
‎孩子们 你们的爸爸
‎正在争论哪种乐器最时髦

translation.en: They'll be a while. You coming home with me?
translation.zh: ‎他们还要一会 你要跟我回家吗？

translation.en: Can Benny come home and brainstorm with us?
translation.zh:
‎班尼也能回家
‎跟我们一起头脑风暴吗？

translation.en: If it's okay with his dad, sure.
translation.zh: ‎他爸爸同意的话 那当然行

translation.en: -Bee-Bee, sweetie, your Glammy wants you. -Okay. Bye!
translation.zh: ‎笔笔 亲爱的 你的美美在找你 ‎好的 再见！

translation.en: -Later! -Bye!
translation.zh:
‎-回见！
‎-再见！

translation.en: Come on, man, the bass is the backbone.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 老兄 贝斯才是支柱

translation.en: Let's brainstorm about how to get Benny back home.
translation.zh:
‎让我们来头脑风暴吧
‎想想怎么把班尼送回家

translation.en: Say what?
translation.zh: ‎你说什么？

translation.en: ♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
translation.zh: ‎头脑风暴 头脑风暴！

translation.en: ♪ Throw in every thought you've had No idea is ever bad ♪
translation.zh: ‎召集所有的想法 一个都不要落下

translation.en: -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪ -♪ Gather up your friends, try ♪
translation.zh: ‎头脑风暴 头脑风暴！ ‎带着朋友使劲想 想出

translation.en: -♪ To find the how ♪ -♪ The what ♪
translation.zh:
‎带着朋友使劲想 想出 ‎-解决的
‎-办法

translation.en: -♪ The why ♪ -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
translation.zh: ‎头脑风暴 头脑风暴！

translation.en: ♪ Let our imaginations Become great new creations ♪
translation.zh: ‎开启头脑风暴 想出伟大的创造

translation.en: ♪ When we brainstorm, brainstorm! Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起头脑风暴 头脑风暴！
‎头脑风暴 头脑风暴！

translation.en: ♪ Hey! ♪
We could hook Benny up to a jetpack.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以让本尼背上喷气背包

translation.en: He'd get home in no time.
translation.zh: ‎他立刻就能到家了

translation.en: But I think they take a lot of practice to control.
translation.zh:
‎但我认为
‎这需要大量的练习才能好好控制

translation.en: What if we made the fastest underground train
translation.zh: ‎我们造一辆世上最快的地铁

translation.en: to take you super fast?
translation.zh: ‎送你回家 怎么样？

translation.en: -[Ada] Let's go! -[Benny] Whoa!
translation.zh: ‎我们出发吧！

translation.en: The permits we'd have to get
translation.zh: ‎我们该怎么弄到

translation.en: to tunnel through all the gopher cities down there? Ugh!
translation.zh: ‎所有地鼠城市的挖隧道许可证？

translation.en: Nightmare!
translation.zh: ‎糟透了！

translation.en: -Right. Who wants to deal with that? -Ooh! An idea's downloading.
translation.zh: ‎没错 谁想来处理这个问题？ ‎我想到一个主意

translation.en: What if we make a bot
translation.zh: ‎要是我们制造一个

translation.en: that can run as fast as the fastest man alive?
translation.zh:
‎速度跟世上跑得最快的人
‎一样快的机器人呢？

translation.en: He can take me home and get me back here before my family misses me.
translation.zh:
‎他可以带我回家
‎还能在我家人想念我之前带我回来

translation.en: That would be freaky, and amazing! But what if the bot won't stop?
translation.zh: ‎那很诡异 但是很神奇！ ‎但如果机器人停不下来该怎么办？

translation.en: Yeah, that would be insane in the mainframe.
translation.zh: ‎没错 要是在主机里 那就太疯狂了

translation.en: Ugh! I wish I could just snap my fingers
translation.zh: ‎真希望我能像银河博士一样

translation.en: and beam you home like Doctor Galactic would.
translation.zh: ‎打个响指就能把你传送回家

translation.en: That's it! I'll make a teleportation device
translation.zh: ‎就是这样！我要制作《彗星任务》里

translation.en: like Doctor Galactic's in Comet Quest!
translation.zh: ‎银河博士那样的瞬移装置！

translation.en: -That would be space-tastic! -I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎那一定会像宇宙一样厉害！ ‎我觉得不好说
‎科学家们还没研究出瞬移的方法

translation.en: Scientists haven't figured out teleportation yet.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得不好说
‎科学家们还没研究出瞬移的方法

translation.en: Isn't that more like science fiction than actual science?
translation.zh:
‎这不是更像科幻
‎而不是真正的科学吗？

translation.en: Lots of things were sci-fi before they were science.
translation.zh: ‎很多东西在成为科学之前都只是科幻

translation.en: Cell phones,
translation.zh: ‎手机

translation.en: space stations,
translation.zh: ‎空间站

translation.en: -robot puppies. -[barking]
translation.zh: ‎机器小狗

translation.en: -You're right. -True.
translation.zh:
‎-你说得对
‎-没错

translation.en: If you wanna change stuff, you gotta think big!
translation.zh:
‎如果你想改变什么
‎你就得大胆想象！

translation.en: And I have to try, or I'm never going home again.
translation.zh:
‎而且我必须试试
‎不然我就再也回不了家了

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对

translation.en: Scientists try impossible stuff all the time.
translation.zh: ‎科学家一直在尝试不可能的事物

translation.en: -They do. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-确实
‎-没错

translation.en: Okay. My gears are turning. Since Comet Quest is my jam,
translation.zh: ‎我的齿轮在转动 ‎《彗星任务》是我的最爱

translation.en: I've done a lot of research on teleportation.
translation.zh: ‎所以我早就做了很多关于瞬移的研究

translation.en: I think I know how to do it.
translation.zh: ‎我想我知道该怎么做了

translation.en: You have a hypothesis?
translation.zh: ‎你有什么假设吗？

translation.en: A hypothe-what now?
translation.zh: ‎假什么？

translation.en: -[laughing] -♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们提出了假设

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们提出了假设

translation.en: -♪ Does that… ♪ -♪ Observation ♪
translation.zh:
‎-那个…
‎-观察

translation.en: -♪ Mean this… ♪ - ♪Explanation? ♪
translation.zh:
‎-到底能够…
‎-解释吗？

translation.en: ♪ Right or wrong Let's find out what the answer is ♪
translation.zh: ‎对或错 让我们一起找出答案

translation.en: ♪ It might not be right But we're gonna find out ♪
translation.zh: ‎可能犯错 但我们一定会找出

translation.en: ♪ What this theory is all about ♪
translation.zh: ‎这个理论该怎么解释

translation.en: ♪ An educated guess ♪
translation.zh:
‎-合理猜想
‎-是否能通过测验？

translation.en: -♪ Will it stand up to our test? ♪ -♪ That's what a hypothesis is ♪
translation.zh:
‎-合理猜想
‎-是否能通过测验？ ‎没错 那就是假设

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们提出了假设

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们提出了假设

translation.en: ♪ Let's find out how right it is ♪
translation.zh: ‎一起来发现到底对不对！

translation.en: ♪ Let's go! ♪
translation.zh: ‎开始喽！

translation.en: To teleport, you have to travel faster than the speed of light.
translation.zh:
‎想要瞬移
‎你必须以超过光速的速度行进

translation.en: So, my hypothesis is, if I can do that,
translation.zh: ‎所以 我的假设是 如果我能超过光速

translation.en: I can beam myself home.
translation.zh: ‎我就能传送回家了

translation.en: But no one's traveled faster than the speed of light.
translation.zh: ‎但是没有人的速度能比光速更快

translation.en: Yet. But maybe we could if we made a Beaming Booth,
translation.zh:
‎还没有
‎但我们也许能建造一间传送亭

translation.en: like Doctor Galactic's teleportation machine.
translation.zh: ‎就像银河博士的瞬移机器那样

translation.en: -That's true. -Let's do it!
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-我们开始吧！

translation.en: Loading the lab…
translation.zh: ‎加载实验室…

translation.en: This is bomb-dot-com! Hold the smartphone!
translation.zh: ‎真是太酷炫了！ ‎等等！你们居然有抓娃娃机？

translation.en: You have a claw machine? And a driving simulation machine? And…
translation.zh: ‎等等！你们居然有抓娃娃机？ ‎还有驾驶模拟机？ ‎甚至还有风洞？

translation.en: [voice echos] …and a wind tunnel?!
translation.zh: ‎甚至还有风洞？

translation.en: -[laughing] -Now I'm being really nosy.
translation.zh: ‎现在好管闲事的人是我了

translation.en: You're gonna fit right in, Benny.
translation.zh: ‎你很快就会适应的 班尼

translation.en: Especially with this.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是穿上这个

translation.en: Wow! This looks like it was made just for me.
translation.zh: ‎看起来简直是为我量身定做的

translation.en: Aw! Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们

translation.en: You're welcome. Now, let's get to work.
translation.zh: ‎不客气 我们马上开工吧

translation.en: -I could design the Beaming Booth. -And I could build it.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以设计传送亭
‎-我可以把它建起来

translation.en: Only problem is, Doctor Galactic used supplies from seven different planets.
translation.zh:
‎唯一的问题是 银河博士
‎有七个不同星球的材料可以用

translation.en: Since we have to stay on Earth, we can see what's in my garage.
translation.zh:
‎既然我们得待在地球上
‎我们可以去看看我的车库里有些啥

translation.en: -[kids giggle] -But the keys add the magic.
translation.zh: ‎但是键盘乐器赋予了魔力

translation.en: The bass keeps your feet tapping.
translation.zh: ‎贝斯能让你忍不住打拍子

translation.en: Ta-da!
translation.zh: ‎嗒哒！

translation.en: I programmed it using the speed of the world's fastest animals.
translation.zh:
‎我的程序编好了
‎它能使用世上最快的动物的速度

translation.en: The peregrine falcon, cheetah, and black marlin.
translation.zh: ‎游隼 猎豹 还有黑枪鱼

translation.en: With all that speed, this is definitely gonna work.
translation.zh: ‎以这么快的速度 肯定能成功的

translation.en: Thanks for helping me, guys. I'm going home to see Dre. Benny B. out!
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们的帮助 朋友 ‎我现在要回家见德瑞了 ‎班尼 下线！

translation.en: Wait. We should test it first to make sure it's safe.
translation.zh:
‎等等 我们应该先测试一下
‎确保它是安全的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you're right. Benny B. in.
translation.zh: ‎哦 没错 你说得对 班尼 上线

translation.en: I guess I could sacrifice my egg salad sandwich… for science.
translation.zh:
‎我想我可以牺牲一下
‎我的鸡蛋沙拉三明治…为了科学

translation.en: That'll work.
translation.zh: ‎应该行得通

translation.en: Hit it, Benny!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 班尼！

translation.en: -[Benny] It worked! -Mind blown!
translation.zh:
‎-成功了！
‎-太震撼了！

translation.en: -[giggles] -Guys, I don't think it did. Look.
translation.zh: ‎伙计们 我觉得没成功 你们瞧

translation.en: -Bummer. -Phooey.
translation.zh:
‎-真扫兴
‎-唉

translation.en: Things don't always work out on the first try.
translation.zh: ‎事情并不总是一次就能解决的

translation.en: But you programmed it with so much speed.
translation.zh:
‎但是你的程序
‎给它提供了这么快的速度

translation.en: We can brainstorm new ideas.
translation.zh: ‎我们能头脑风暴再想新办法

translation.en: No, this has to work.
translation.zh: ‎不 这一定能成功

translation.en: What travels faster than the speed of light?
translation.zh: ‎什么东西的速度比光速还快？

translation.en: Think, Benny, think!
translation.zh: ‎想想 班尼 快想想！

translation.en: Ooh! Maybe sound!
translation.zh: ‎也许是声音！

translation.en: -I'm not sure if that's true. -It's gonna work. It just has to.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定这是不是真的 ‎会成功的 必须成功

translation.en: -Okay… -Let's fire it up!
translation.zh:
‎-好了…
‎-启动！

translation.en: -[sighs] -It's okay, Benny.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 班尼

translation.en: Even the best scientists in the world haven't cracked the teleportation code.
translation.zh:
‎就算是世上最棒的科学家
‎也没能破解瞬移的代码

translation.en: Code! I just need the right code!
translation.zh: ‎代码！我只需要正确的代码！

translation.en: -[Rosie] Yikes! -[Ada] Oh, no!
translation.zh:
‎-哎呀！
‎-哦 糟了！

translation.en: -[Ada gasps] -I'm so sorry!
translation.zh: ‎我真的很抱歉！

translation.en: You tried to help, let me use your lab and everything,
translation.zh: ‎你们想帮我 ‎让我用实验室和那么多东西

translation.en: and I knocked out the power. And I'm still not going back home.
translation.zh: ‎我却弄坏了电源 ‎但我还是回不了家

translation.en: -Sorry, Benny. -[barks]
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 班尼

translation.en: I crossed my fingers and toes that it would work.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚还交叉手指和脚趾
‎祈祷能够成功呢

translation.en: It might've been a flop,
translation.zh: ‎也许是失败了

translation.en: but you didn't stop.
translation.zh: ‎但你并没有罢休

translation.en: You've got grit, B.
translation.zh: ‎你很有勇气 班尼

translation.en: We didn't figure out how to teleport you home,
translation.zh: ‎我们还是不知道要怎么把你瞬移回家

translation.en: but I have a theory.
translation.zh: ‎但我有个建议

translation.en: Maybe making new friends can cure your homesickness.
translation.zh: ‎也许交新朋友可以治愈你的思乡病

translation.en: Come on, watch Comet Quest with us.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 跟我们一起看《彗星任务》吧

translation.en: [all] "We don't rest until we quest!"
translation.zh: ‎“我们不达目的誓不罢休！”

translation.en: That was the business! 'Night, kids.
translation.zh: ‎就是要这股劲！晚安 孩子们

translation.en: Another out-of-this-world episode! I'm gonna see what Dre thought.
translation.zh:
‎又是精彩绝伦的一集！
‎我想听听德瑞是怎么想的

translation.en: I found a way to stay close.
translation.zh: ‎我又想到一个保持联系的办法

translation.en: You were right. It was time for a new idea. Bam!
translation.zh: ‎你是对的 是时候试试新点子了

translation.en: Ham radio!
translation.zh:
‎-业余无线电！
‎-酷！

translation.en: I can use it to talk to Dre from anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎我可以用它在任何地方和德瑞通话

translation.en: The signal's so strong that you can even bounce it off of the moon.
translation.zh:
‎它的信号很强
‎甚至能收到月球上反射回来的信号

translation.en: [Rosie] Fab-tastic!
translation.zh: ‎棒呆了！

translation.en: Luckily, Dre doesn't live that far away.
translation.zh: ‎幸运的是 德瑞住得没那么远

translation.en: Dre, it's me!
translation.zh: ‎德瑞 是我！

translation.en: [Dre] B, can you believe Doctor Galactic finally made it
translation.zh:
‎班尼 你能相信
‎银河博士终于成功抵达

translation.en: to all the moons around Jupiter?
translation.zh: ‎木星周围的所有卫星了吗？

translation.en: Next level, right?
translation.zh: ‎更上一层楼对吧？

translation.en: Say hi to my new friends, Ada, Iggy, and Rosie.
translation.zh:
‎跟我的新朋友们打声招呼
‎阿达 伊吉和罗西

translation.en: -Howdy. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-你们好
‎-嗨

translation.en: -[Dre] Hey. -I miss you so much!
translation.zh:
‎-嘿
‎-我好想你！

translation.en: But at least we can talk all the time with this.
translation.zh: ‎但至少我们可以一直用这个聊天

translation.en: Me too, but I'm glad you have new friends. I can't wait to meet them.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 但我很高兴你交到了新朋友 ‎我等不及要见见他们了

translation.en: -Love you, cuz. -Love you, B.
translation.zh:
‎-爱你 表哥
‎-爱你 班尼

translation.en: Call you tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎明天再联系你

translation.en: Aw! Your cousin seems awesome. Just like you.
translation.zh: ‎你表哥听上去很棒 跟你一样

translation.en: We're happy you're not an evil unicorn bot that loves music.
translation.zh:
‎我们也很高兴
‎你不是热爱音乐的邪恶独角机器人

translation.en: Huh! I'm definitely not.
translation.zh: ‎我绝对不是

translation.en: But an evil, music-loving unicorn bot sounds wicked.
translation.zh:
‎但是热爱音乐的邪恶独角机器人
‎听起来酷极了

translation.en: Adding that to my list of ideas for comic book villains.
translation.zh:
‎我要把它加进
‎我的漫画反派灵感清单里

translation.en: According to my calculations,
translation.zh: ‎根据我的计算

translation.en: this is gonna be the start of a beautiful friendship.
translation.zh: ‎这将是一段美好友谊的开始

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all laugh]
